ygData.subject: Re: a bug question
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummm hers the thing about corpse time Your corpse if over lvl 6 then your body will stay in the game for 7real days(Out of game meaning not playing the game
ygData.messageBody:
Ummm hers the thing about corpse time>> Your corpse if over lvl 6 then
your body will stay in the game for 7real days(Out of game meaning not
playing the game it counts even when you on the character select screen but
not in the server selection screen s go to tech. chat they will actually go
to ytour server and help you from the chat room:))and 24 hours in game (real
time this also means being at the character select screen and being on with
your other characters also counts as this time) However what you have on
your corpse and how much the stuff is worth will raise this time, so if you
ahve like 500pp on you and a full set of plate and maybe a crapload of other
kick ass stuff your decay time willl be drastically changed meaning it could
take days(real time in the game ) or weeks (out of game) so basically it all
depends on your valubales your carring but base is 24 in game and 7 days out
of game..
Krix Mathar
Guardians of Norrath
-----Original Message-----
From: Mystik <mystik@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:21 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] a bug question


>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
>ok....upon my most recent excursion, i ventured away from the
>lizard-filled ruins of cazic thule, and set out for the undead dungeon
>lower guk....well, when i got there, <mind you i had not been there but
>once before> i was following some group members, and went into a room
>with vampire bats..<they're not undead btw> and was promptly
>attacked.....the group was helping me, but things took a turn for the
>worse and we had to run for the zone....i unfortunately was killed
>swimming in the water back to the zone. well, when i went to go find my
>corpse, it wasn't there, and doing the /corpse command revealed nothing
>except for "it can't be summoned from here" well, i guess it got stuck
>in hte wall or something, so i peititioned them to move it so i could
>loot it..haven't got a response to it yet, but am gonna keep
>trying.....what my question is <i know you're saying about time!!> is
>this...does anyone know how long of logged in time will a lv 37 <this is
>freakin why i didn't get to make 38 :P> will stay around? i need them to
>move it before time's up, and i was wondeirng how long it would remain
>there.....i think so far i've been logged on about 7 and a half hours
>since it happened...i've heard it'll be there for 24 hours of logged in
>time...is this right?
>
>(\/)ystix Spellchaser
>lv 37 human cleric of The Rathe
>
>ps thanx for putting up with my ramblings (:
>
>
